description:
The 1994 movie The Crow brought to life the graphic novel created by James O’Barr for the big screen. It would be several decades and a number of sequels and one short-lived TV series before another direct adaptation would arrive. Now fans are set to receive The Crow starring Bill Skarsgård, taking over from the [...]

The post Bill Skarsgård Says ‘The Crow’ Is Not A Remake Of Brandon Lee’s 1994 Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Bill Skarsgård Says ‘The Crow’ Is Not A Remake Of Brandon Lee’s 1994 Movie

description:
The Anaconda film franchise has been around since 1997, and according to the latest report, it’s still showing no signs of slowing. In fact, a brand-new reimagining is set to take the Anaconda brand to an all-new level, with major Hollywood players Jack Black and Paul Rudd in talks to star. Interestingly, there seems to [...]

The post Jack Black And Paul Rudd In Talks For New ‘Anaconda’ Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Jack Black And Paul Rudd In Talks For New ‘Anaconda’ Movie

description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has become increasingly connected with the release of Deadpool & Wolverine. The newly-released blockbuster established the existence of Wesley Snipes as Blade in the Multiverse, something which came as a major shock while Marvel Studios continues to develop their own take on Blade. Now, however, a new Blade movie with Wesley [...]

The post New ‘Blade’ Movie With Wesley Snipes Seems Likely As Marvel Reportedly Moves Away From Mahershala Ali appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: New ‘Blade’ Movie With Wesley Snipes Seems Likely As Marvel Reportedly Moves Away From Mahershala Ali
